data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: In the summer, my mother always wears a yellow hat. It's b__ and h__ a r__ flower o_ it. She we___ it i_ the gar___ because t__ sun i_ very h__ in t__ summer. I don't like the hat, but it is easy to find her when she wears it!
data.fullContent: In the summer, my mother always wears a yellow hat. It's big and has a red flower on it. She wears it in the garden because the sun is very hot in the summer. I don't like the hat, but it is easy to find her when she wears it!
data.answer: 在夏天，我妈妈总是戴着一顶黄色的帽子。它很大，上面有一朵红色的花。她在花园里戴着它，因为夏天太阳很热。我不喜欢这顶帽子，但当她戴着它时，很容易就能找到她!
